text: The COVID-19 crisis should remind Americans that we're not just voting for a collection of policies, but a human being who will face tests. When Trump faced his crisis, he responded with falsehoods, remarkable incoherence, and extreme vanity. He still is. And he'd do it again.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden
